actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution suspending paragraph 1 of rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to permit a photograph of the Senate in session.

summary.text: Suspends rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to permit the United States Capitol Historical Society to photograph the Senate in actual session.

titles.title: A resolution suspending paragraph 1 of rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to permit a photograph of the Senate in session.
